jobDetails.jobDescription:
Overview:We provide automation and digitalization technologies to the world's leadingprocess industries, serving over 30,000 large industrial enterprises globally with ateam of 5,000+ employees.Our R&D teams focus on Process Industry AI (AIO) and modern industrialsoftware applications, with work locations in Singapore, China Hangzhou, and Japan.
Job Responsibilities:Use data-driven and AI approaches to push beyond the limits offirst-principles-based chemical process control.
Preferred Qualities:Passion about the intersection of chemical process control, softwareengineering, and machine learning.Strong foundation in Chemical Process Engineering.
Qualifications:Understand the difference between AI Optimization and traditional controlmethods like MPC—and can prove you have what it takes to contribute.Comfortable with software engineering & ML basics—e.g., launching an Ubuntu image, setting up a PyTorch environment, and building a data pipeline.
